Comment.Language: For the 29th of each Coptic Month:

Text.Language: <ere y/e~tacjem h~mot: P[oic sop neme: ,ere y/e~tac[i n~ten piaggeloc: m~v~rasi m~pikocmoc.
Hail to her who found grace, the Lord be with you, Hail to her who received from the angel, the joy of the world.

<ere B/yleem: t~polic n~nip~rov/t/c: y/etaumec Pi,~rictoc n~q/tc: pimahc~nau n~Adam.
Hail to Bethlehem, the city of the prophets, in which Christ was born, the Second Adam.

<ere tefa~nactacic: e~taftwnf e~bolqen n/eymwout: sa n~tefcw] m~mon: e~bolqen nennobi.
Hail to His Resurrection, when He rose from the dead, in order to save us, from our sins.
